author: PTI
title: BJP spreading virus of communal prejudice: Sonia
description: BJP spreading virus of communal prejudice: Sonia Addressing a meeting of the Congress Working Committee, Gandhi said this should worry every Indian and the Congress will have to work hard to repair this damage
content:
NEW DELHI: Congress president Sonia Gandhi on Thursday accused the BJP of spreading the virus of communal prejudice and hatred in the country and asserted that "grave damage" is being done to social harmony.
